item.title: WiFi Kettle
item.description: After being inspired by the rather novel iKettle, I decided I could create my own WiFi enable kettle as a little project! How I made it: Link to heading The enclosure Link to heading One of the last components I actually bought - it’s just a small power supply unit enclosure I picked up for a couple of quid from Maplin. Bottom side of the enclosure Link to heading I have many Raspberry Pi’s lying around the house, I believe the one pictured is the first Model B.
